original_text: (though he himself did none of these things), who even eats upon the mountains, defiles his neighbor's wife,
korean_text: 산 위에서 제물을 먹거나 이웃의 아내를 더럽히거나

sentences.original_text: though he himself did none of these things
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그 자신은 이런 일들을 전혀 하지 않았지만

sentences.original_text: who even eats upon the mountains
